pages.text: The $(mob)Krill$() is an animal found in $(thing)Beaches$(). It wanders around and flees when hit. It can be bred with $(item)Seeds$().$(p)Its meat is a poor source of food, but when standing on sandy blocks it will occasionally forage the ground. Usually it will only find mundane $(item)Sticks$() or $(item)Flint$(), but rarely it can be lucky and find rare items such as $(item)Diamonds$().
